ValidationRule.description: Prevent any profile beside System Admin from change the FEIN of a Current Client Integration Rule
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), RecordTypeId <> "012500000000rIR", ISCHANGED( Federal_ID_Number__c ), NOT(ISNULL( Bis_ID__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** This is an HRIS Integrated Record , the Federal ID Number can not be Modified
